title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: When it comes to the topic of how long a man should last in bed, I think social media and adult sites have painted a very wrong narrative regarding this thereby putting unnecessary pressure on an average man who will be willing to go to any length just to meet up with the high expectation of people on how long one is to last in bed.Most social media ads and advert is now centered on selling energizing drugs that will boost how long one lasts in bed and youths are seriously taking it at an alarming rate without considering the implication it will have on them in the future. The sad thing about most of these herbal drugs is that they have serious side effects both at the present and in the future of the user.According to health practitioners, sex is supposed to last between the range of 3 to 15 minutes, and our youth have to understand that it is not a do-or-die affair, it is called love not a show of one's strength as a manI strongly feel that the pressure that if you don't last up to a particular time, that you're not man enough is the reason why most persons have resolved into the use of energizing/ herbal drugs.If una get wetin una wan yarn about this matter, make una yarn am.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Nah only poor man the carry the matta of satisfying a woman in bed for him head, the rich has no such time. Sex isn't a marathon that you must last for a speculated minutes or hour before it should be termed enjoyable.People that takes drugs before having sex to satisfy a woman are causing a future health hazard to their body system and organs of your body. The side effects of those drugs is what you don't want to know reason been that if you do you won't dare take it. The more you take sex enhancement drug the more your system gets weaken that you can't sleep with a woman without taking those drugs and anytime you don't take it your manhood won't kick because it has gotten used to been kicked through sex enhance meds.¬†Now the question is this how long do you plan on taking those drugs all your life?¬† It's quite unfortunate that sex has caused a lot of young men to turn into drug addicts and very soon we might be having countless cases of organ failures diseases in the future 10 years from now among people that would be age 40 by then.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: This is now common in our society, instead of people focusing on thinking about the way forward and how to improve their well-being, they are busy taking sexually enhanced drugs to satisfy a woman who will not add food to their table, they have to understand that these sexually enhanced drugs have an adverse effect, ranging from the weakness of the body, muscle over stressing, this might even cause muscle cramp as the case may be, it can also affecting the liver, because the liver does detoxification of waste metabolism, every drug that has been taken by a person is been worked upon by the liver, what if the enhancement drug is stronger than your liver what now happens, this will result in liver malfunction, this is why we should be mindful of what we take in, as a people.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: It pain me whenever I see some news on social media about some men trying to satisfy their woman by taking some drugs and die in the process, which are some things bitcoiners need to avoid because there are some healthy food you can consum before meeting a woman that will help you to last long to satisfy your woman at the moment. I can still remember some of the local food you will eat to boost your energy in a way your wife will be the one to tell you that she is tired, but don't kill your wife because of sex when you know that she don't have such power to accommodate your energy.¬†If you want to listen to such ladies that laugh at you because you didn't last long in bed you will die young,so the best way to avoid premature death is to avoid such people that will be telling you harder when you know if you go further you are dead.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Lida93 on October 20, 2023, 08:51:54 PMNah only poor man the carry the matta of satisfying a woman in bed for him head, the rich has no such time. Sex isn't a marathon that you must last for a speculated minutes or hour before it should be termed enjoyable.To be frank, i no read the op but I'm making this my response based on the caption and this very post by @Lida93 ¬†because alot of people ¬†dey see sex as marathon and dem dey really ¬†do everything within their powers to last longer no wonder we dey get alot of stories about men dying during sex and not women and this is supposed to be a wake up call ¬†to men that women are generally ¬†created not to easily get tired during sex and no matter how hard you try, you go barely win woman because anytime you tap am, I'm sure say, woman suppose open legs, so no need to get pressured but just do the best you can.Sex no be competition and on several cases, I don besr how guy don threaten to shift woman womb but still end up tired and according to Google the maximum time.you suppose stay on top woman na roughly 5mins as 3 mins dey enough to get all the pleasure you desire.But me I be machine not to¬† brag but any baby female for here wey dey doubt fit still¬† slide in my pm make I prove myself üòÅüòÖü§≠

comments.author: Pi-network314159
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on October 20, 2023, 08:25:09 PMWhen it comes to the topic of how long a man should last in bed, I think social media and adult sites have painted a very wrong narrative regarding this thereby putting unnecessary pressure on an average man who will be willing to go to any length just to meet up with the high expectation of people on how long one is to last in bed.No matter the wrong narrative the internet painted on using high drug for sex, that shouldn't make someone to also force yourself to it. Internet is a place to promote business and only the interested one's go for it. It's not a must.Quote from: Hewlet on October 20, 2023, 08:25:09 PMMost social media ads and advert is now centered on selling energizing drugs that will boost how long one lasts in bed and youths are seriously taking it at an alarming rate without considering the implication it will have on them in the future. The sad thing about most of these herbal drugs is that they have serious side effects both at the present and in the future of the user.Some of this drugs being advertised on social media are not really what it's painted. there are also herbal mixtures which can cleans your body system and make you feel like a real man. The problem of drug addiction is as a cause of the female gender not always being sexually satisfied. Normal sex is supposed to last for some few minutes maybe 5 to 15 minutes, but due to the female sex drive is always higher than the male, it becomes difficult to satisfy them except you go for 2 rounds. Lack of satisfying your female sexual counterpart always cause relationship breakup even in marriages. Sometimes married women who lack aprioprate sex from there husband commits adultery. Men now decided to keep there relationship by all means which now involved had drug. There is a pharmacy within my area when ever I go to buy medicine, young able and vibrant men both married and unmarried always come to buy sex pill. Quote from: Hewlet on October 20, 2023, 08:25:09 PMAccording to health practitioners, sex is supposed to last between the range of 3 to 15 minutes, and our youth have to understand that it is not a do-or-die affair, it is called love not a show of one's strength as a manI strongly feel that the pressure that if you don't last up to a particular time, that you're not man enough is the reason why most persons have resolved into the use of energizing/ herbal drugs.If una get wetin una wan yarn about this matter, make una yarn am.It always feel good as a man to do the needful, satisfying your partner always make her not to think otherwise. It's good to do your work well, as that always make her to love you more. Women always love men that do the work well.I think you are misinterpreting drug for herbal mixtures. herbal mixtures is not a drug and it's preferable than drug because it's a mixture of natural roots and has no Side effect like drug. I don't want to mention any drugs but you go serch for yourself on Google.

comments.author: Youngkhngdiddy
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on October 30, 2023, 06:05:18 PMIt pain me whenever I see some news on social media about some men trying to satisfy their woman by taking some drugs and die in the process, which are some things bitcoiners need to avoid because there are some healthy food you can consum before meeting a woman that will help you to last long to satisfy your woman at the moment. I can still remember some of the local food you will eat to boost your energy in a way your wife will be the one to tell you that she is tired, but don't kill your wife because of sex when you know that she don't have such power to accommodate your energy.¬†If you want to listen to such ladies that laugh at you because you didn't last long in bed you will die young,so the best way to avoid premature death is to avoid such people that will be telling you harder when you know if you go further you are dead. ¬† Drugs consumption is not good for the body, excess use of this drug may even have some effect in the body, instead of using this drugs, we can use fruit instead, fruits like coconut, watermelon, tiger nuts and deat. There‚Äôs no drugs that can enhance sex we shouldn‚Äôt be deceived that there‚Äôs drugs that can boost sex drive, quack pharmacist will say anything to just to sell their market, so that they can make their money, and if we continue to use this enhancing product may damage our system. ¬†¬† Sex shouldn‚Äôt be a do or die thing, after all women prefer romantic intercourse rather than all this hard core type. They feel more level of satisfaction when you make love to them rather than fucking them. And even if you come across those that like it hard there‚Äôs nothing to prove and no award attached to having the best sex, sex should be enjoyed by the both parties and not the man killing himself just to prove a point. Try some thing different this time maybe a romantic date out with your partner, all this experience are always the best.
